name: AR Jigsaw Puzzles+
description: With augmented reality, you can play jigsaw puzzles on your coffee table or a kitchen table, on the beach or in bed. You can play anywhere your phone detects a surface.  Enjoy completing our beautiful puzzles with 42 pieces, 80 pieces, 120 pieces or 180 pieces.   The pictures are cut different each time you play so you can enjoy them again and again.  Since it is in AR you can move around and be as close to the pieces as you would like.
